last_episode_to_air.name: Everything Will Be Fine
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sarma and Anthony flee to Las Vegas, then hide out in the tourist town of Pigeon Forge, Tennessee, where their past finally catches up with them.

name: Bad Vegan: Fame. Fraud. Fugitives.
overview: After marrying a mysterious man who claimed he could make her dog immortal, a celebrated vegan restaurateur finds her life veering off the rails.

episodes.name: Mr. & Mrs. Fox
episodes.overview: A-list vegan chef Sarma Melngaillis falls for a mysterious charmer who sweeps her off her feet, promising to pay her debts.  Is he too good to be true?

episodes.name: Happily Ever After
episodes.overview: Anthony's claims grow increasingly bizarre -- he even convinces Sarma he has magical powers.  Over the course of two years, she wires him $1.7 million.

episodes.name: No Angels in Hell
episodes.overview: Anthony takes control of the restaurant.  While he and Sarma travel around Europe, the employees stop getting paid -- and walk out.

episodes.name: Everything Will Be Fine
episodes.overview: Sarma and Anthony flee to Las Vegas, then hide out in the tourist town of Pigeon Forge, Tennessee, where their past finally catches up with them.
